WARNING!

This is a modified beta. The real name is utorrent-1.7-beta-1137_patch.exe

It installs into the C:\WINDOWS\system32\micro1\ directory the following viruses:
Two adwares and two trojans which are
1) Win32:Adware-gen. [Adw]
2) Win32:Small-AHY [Trj]
3) Win32:Surfside [Adw]
4) Win32:Trojan-gen. {Other}
